content: this pattern works up so quick and yet it is so **versatile** it can be made with any weight of yarn by holding multiple strands together or by using a bulky yarn the 30 minute cowl is perfect for ***craft fairs*** or ***last-minute gifts*** since the smaller length takes 30 minutes to make the longer version takes just over an hour there is less time fidgeting with stitches since the design is worked around the chains instead of into the stitch the samples featured in the photo were made as follows **maroon infinity cowl** * *red heart with love* - two strands held together throughout * *follow instructions for the longer scarf* * *whipstitch ends together* **buttoned scarflet** * *lion brand jiffy solids* - two strands held together throughout * *follow instructions for the shorter scarf* * *follow finishing instructions for the scarf* **twisted neck cowl** * *lion brand homespun thick & quick* - one strand * *follow instructions for the shorter scarf* * *twist once and whipstitch the ends together* enjoy
